title: Metabolic and behavioural risk factors for cardiovascular diseases in Southern Latin America: analysis of the Global Burden of Disease 1990–2019

Source: Public Health, Volume 235

Author(s): C. Briones-Valdivieso, P.R.V.O. Salerno, E.M. Navarrete-Muñoz, D. Valera-Gran, R. López-Bueno, S. Al-Kindi, S.V. Deo, F. Petermann-Rocha
